title: Didn't get my free promotional win
body:
I was recently just playing my promos into gold III and I have been in the promotionals into Gold III before today. And I won my match and realized I didn't get promoted and didn't get my free win. 

Is it because I got demoted at some point since than and that's why? After I reached the promos and lost, I got demoted and than immediately promoted back into Gold IV.

replies.body:
That would be the reason. Promo helper will only stick around for one promo, so if you demote, it will apply to the promo to get back up to where you started.
Also, make sure not to dodge in any promo series. Doing so will not only count as a loss in your best-of, but prevent you from getting promo helper should you fail to promote!
Sure you'll make a come back though, dood! :D I got faith in ya!
